resources.string: Let\'s get started. First, pick a time that you want to be notified each day with the next question. Then, Click finsh, and you\'ll get your first question! \n Don\'t worry, you can change this later on in settings

\t\t\t\tQuintessence Learning is a mobile app created for parents who want to engage their children in meaningful dialogue to take advantage of the waining time they have with their children. The app conveniently pushes out daily questions and activities to get the most out of the time with your children and get them off their devices. We understand how busy parents are today and easy it is to fall into tell me “two things about your day” trap…or even worse the TV and device rabbit hole. \n\t\t\t\tWith standardized testing results as the barometer of a teacher’s success, we also notice that the necessary creative and critical thinking skills are not being developed during school hours. We are leveraging all the latest research and a 40-year educator who has focused on early childhood and Gifted and Talented Education. Through decades of lessons plans spanning pre-kindergarten to high school, these are the absolute best questions and activities to foster creative thinking and emotional development.
You can use this screen to submit questions you have thought of, or any feedback you have about our program!
Fill out the form below if you have any thoughts about our app. We\'ll get back to you as soon as possible!
Please make sure your passwords match
Please Login, or create a new account
Please make sure to fill out all fields
